prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (massive rotund alien creature:1.2), (moist biological pink skin texture:1.3), short black antennae, dead black void eyes, menacing grin, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed alien skin pores, (organic fleshy wrinkles:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fabric texture on cape:1.2), sharp focus on eyes, cinematic lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.4), (doll:1.4), mannequin, human skin tone, dry skin, matte, low quality, (too cute:1.5), baby
